subject: Request for refund
description_text:
Hello,
I want to refund this baseplate that just received a few hours ago, it
doesn’t fit my desk. The order number is
#SSN1960.

conversations.body_text: ​  Hi, did you have any problems with the product you received?

No, but it’s too complicated to install and the pedals too? In the end, I
changed to different company. So I don’t need this anymore

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 11:32 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Dat Tran,    Sorry, the return process requires the conditions in the return policy below to be met, we are unable to make a free return for you if the product is not defective, sincere apologies. If you really need to return it, you can return it to our US warehouse by yourself and we will refund you after inspection by our warehouse staff. This is the warehouse address:   CAMZ Chino Warehouse (System Code: CAMZ)  Contact: Greg -MZ(1330006)  Phone: 480 387 3114  ADD: 14210 Telephone Ave, Chino, CA 91710 USA,Dock 4-10

1ZC6000D0331141414

On Fri, Jul 18, 2025 at 12:37 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Dat Tran,    Ok, we will refund you once we receive and check the item in our warehouse, sorry for the inconvenience.

Hello,

The product has delivered to you 2 days ago, until now, I still haven’t

Hi Dat Tran,     We have refunded your money. Please check your account. In addition, after inspection by our US warehouse staff, we have charged you a $10 fee because the pedal you returned was missing parts.

Hi Dat Tran,  The funds will be refunded to the card you used for payment, which should be this Mastercard with the number 9506. Please check.
